plot: Poetic, experimental and different, Container is described by Lukas Moodysson as &"a black and white silent movie with sound&" and with the following words; &"A woman in a man's body. A man in a woman's body. Jesus in Mary's stomach. The water breaks. It floods into me. I can't close the lid. My heart is full.&"   Written by  Sido Lanters
title: Container
